First strike, haste
[i]Battalion[/i] – Whenever Zurxi and at least two other creatures attack, exile target creature you don't control. Put a deserter counter on it.
{R}{W}{B}: Transform Zurxi. Activate only as a sorcery.

At the beginning of your end step, you may put target creature card in exile with a deserter counter on it onto the battlefield under your control. If you don't, each opponent loses 3 life.
{RW}{WB}: Transform Deserter's Curse. Activate only as a sorcery.
